Actions.Name: Add comment to a card
Actions.Description: This operation is used to add a comment to an existing card in LeanKit.

Actions.Name: Create a new board
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new LeanKit board.

Actions.Name: Create a new card
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new card in LeanKit.

Actions.Name: Delete a card
Actions.Description: This operation is used to delete an existing card in LeaKit.

Actions.Name: Get a card
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve all information about a card, given its id.

Actions.Name: When a new card is added
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new card is added to the given board and lane.

Actions.Name: When a card is updated
Actions.Description: Triggers when the details of an existing card are updated.

Actions.Name: Update a card
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update the details of an existing card given its id.
